${ModID}:SpellStone.NAME: Spell Stone
${ModID}:SpellStone.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL The neighboring cards grant !M! Block when played this turn.

${ModID}:PolarBlessing.NAME: Polar Blessing
${ModID}:PolarBlessing.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL The neighboring cards are Retained this turn.

${ModID}:MysticCycle.NAME: Mystic Cycle
${ModID}:MysticCycle.DESCRIPTION: {@@}Discard up to 2 cards and draw that many. NL Gain {!M!|1=[E]|2=[E] [E]|@=!M! [E]}.

${ModID}:GravitySlam.NAME: Gravity Slam
${ModID}:GravitySlam.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Discard the neighboring cards.

${ModID}:GrantSwiftness.NAME: Grant Swiftness
${ModID}:GrantSwiftness.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL The neighboring cards draw 1 card when played this turn.

${ModID}:WhiteSteelCharm.NAME: White Steel Charm
${ModID}:WhiteSteelCharm.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When you play a neighboring card, random enemy takes !M! damage.

${ModID}:EclipseCharm.NAME: Eclipse Charm
${ModID}:EclipseCharm.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL When you play a neighboring card !M! times in one turn, gain 1 Strength and Dexterity.
